documents.document: There are 2 movies I watch at least once a year: Rogers & Hammerstein's Cinderella, & Little Shop of Horrors. 2017 is built for the former.
I stayed far away! Save my anxiety for when I've got skin in the game. https://t.co/UXZp8HyUsJ
2017 R&H Cinderella view count: 2. Just. Like. Brandy, Whitney Houston, Bernadette Peters, Whoopi Goldberg, Victor Garber, Jason Alexander.
More slow motion snow dog. Saving up enough footage for the next 5 snowless years in Vancouver.… https://t.co/JOEUk19Gpi
Can't believe we had another snow day, had to mess around with the slo mo a bit 🐕 @ Garry Point… https://t.co/Xy7L6AzulO
A bit of a dog pile. https://t.co/bwvEUInId6
Local #ScienceMarch shld be locally relevant. YVR most needs scientists to support & believe drug users & researchers re: #overdose epidemic
Want a YVR @ScienceMarchDC? Go to the nat'l day of action on overdose. Support evidence-based harm reduction policy. https://t.co/N0H55mpscS
Cavs team handshakes are up there with puppy and baby pics, IMO. https://t.co/R0bskHjD6T
Wait... Is this how we fix the wage gap? https://t.co/u7I8NB7Y7O
@unsuicide Tons of ways to donate knitting and crochet! Many orgs & local hospitals have programs for baby items & chemo caps #copingchat
Yup, that's a stromboli. https://t.co/177FprhK48
I've been listening to a lot of All Hail West Texas since the inauguration. There's also this. https://t.co/430Eq84Xvi
Spent Fri & Sat running a conference about #ementalhealth. Spent tonight playing board games. Unplugging ftw. #EMH2017

@UrbanFoxy @UrbanFoxy I'm playing with it out at the registration desk. It also has a medication reminder system!!
Thanks for coming! The @ubcmedmind presentation is up after our next coffee break! https://t.co/Emv0QR7DuU
Just downloaded #BoosterBuddy from @VanIslandHealth, a game for boosting mental health. Grab a flyer at #EMH2017 https://t.co/7SVhcvgRxj
.@IvaCheung This is a great point. We think of #ehealth as novel because it's young, but the tech is absolutely commonplace. #EMH2017
And then how to get humans to talk to them! #EMH2017 https://t.co/kW9jUyzdIw

.@ACDResearch #ehealth takes constant investment in social media. Many in healthcare are still learning that twitter is a skill to develop.

.@IvaCheung especially​ now while #EMH is young, start-up costs and learning from failure may be expensive! #EMH2017
The annual @ACDResearch e-Mental Health conference is Jan 27-28. Follow on #EMH2017, or mute me if you must!

Followup for my Canadian folks: I love you and it's an honor to live here with you. But I also love the US. Your jokes aren't cute either.
I love Canada and I'm sure I love you too, but it's just not cute.
I get the need for jokes, but miss me with your "moving to Canada, lol, can I sleep on your couch?" stuff.
You've done your thing and voted. It's out of your hands now, make yourself your priority tonight. https://t.co/R6cBQudOMw
